Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.name: Pepper Bacterial Spot
Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial infection causing dark, water-soaked spots on pepper leaves and fruit.

Pepper__bell___healthy.name: Healthy Pepper
Pepper__bell___healthy.description: No signs of disease detected on pepper plant.

Potato___Early_blight.name: Potato Early Blight
Potato___Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing brown spots and concentric rings on potato leaves.

Potato___Late_blight.name: Potato Late Blight
Potato___Late_blight.description: Serious fungal disease leading to black lesions on leaves and stems.

Potato___healthy.name: Healthy Potato
Potato___healthy.description: No signs of disease detected on potato plant.

Tomato_Bacterial_spot.name: Tomato Bacterial Spot
Tomato_Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial infection resulting in small, dark, water-soaked spots on leaves.

Tomato_Early_blight.name: Tomato Early Blight
Tomato_Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing brown spots and concentric rings on tomato leaves.

Tomato_Late_blight.name: Tomato Late Blight
Tomato_Late_blight.description: Fungal disease causing dark lesions on leaves and stems of tomato.

Tomato_Leaf_Mold.name: Tomato Leaf Mold
Tomato_Leaf_Mold.description: Fungal infection leading to yellow spots on leaves and grey mold on the underside.

Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.name: Tomato Septoria Leaf Spot
Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.description: Fungal disease producing small, circular spots with dark borders on leaves.

Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.name: Tomato Spider Mite
Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.description: Pest infestation causing yellowing, speckled leaves due to spider mites.

Tomato__Target_Spot.name: Tomato Target Spot
Tomato__Target_Spot.description: Fungal disease causing target-shaped spots on leaves.

Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.name: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.description: Viral disease causing yellowing and curling of tomato leaves.

Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.name: Tomato Mosaic Virus
Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus.description: Viral infection causing mottled leaves and stunted growth.

Tomato_healthy.name: Healthy Tomato
Tomato_healthy.description: No signs of disease detected on tomato plant.
